text: The Village Voice is shutting down. A New York institution, it was born the same year I was. One nice thing is that they are keeping half the staff, 15 to 20 people, to figure out how to archive the site. Any time a publication does this, we should offer to help, to learn from the experience, and develop a base of knowledge and best practices. I need to figure out how to do that for my blog. I want to do that sooner than later. Tick tock, the runway isn't getting any longer. :check:
